00037 /* global variables. */
00038 static unique syslog_ident = "gtrm-server";

00040 /* externs. */
00041 /* functions. */
00042 extern void parse_options (int, char **);
00043 extern bool be_daemon (void);
00044 extern bool server_run (struct in_addr, uint16_t);
00045 extern void cleanup_files (void);

00047 
00048 /* command line options. */
00049 extern options_info *fop;

00051 /* functions. */
00052 /* the body of the server. */
00053 int
00054 main (int argc, char *argv[])
00055 {
00056   /* hold somes states. */
00057   bool daemon_state = true;     /* failed to run as a daemon? */
00058   bool server_state = true;     /* failed to run the server? */
00059 
00060     /*** support syslog facility. ***/
00061   openlog (syslog_ident, LOG_CONS, LOG_DAEMON);
00062 
00063     /*** parse all input command line options. ***/
00064   parse_options (argc, argv);
00065 
00066   syslog (LOG_INFO, "first heartbeat. alive.");
00067 
00068     /*** try to run as a daemon. ***/
00069   daemon_state = be_daemon ();
00070 
00071     /*** support signal handling. ***/
00072   signals_support (true);
00073 
00074   /* failed to run as a daemon? */
00075   if (!daemon_state)
00076     syslog (LOG_ERR, "be_daemon() failed to run.");
00077   else
00078     {
00079         /*** try to run the server. ***/
00080       server_state = server_run (fop->local_address, fop->port);
00081 
00082       /* failed to run the server? */
00083       if (!server_state)
00084         syslog (LOG_ERR, "server_run() failed to run.");
00085 
00086       /* try to remove files. */
00087       cleanup_files ();
00088     }
00089 
00090   syslog (LOG_INFO, "last heartbeat. dead.");
00091 
00092     /*** stop syslog facility. ***/
00093   closelog ();
00094 
00095   /* daemon (server) exits. */
00096   exit (server_state && daemon_state ? EXIT_SUCCESS : EXIT_FAILURE);
00097 }
